Title: Q'onzu's Distraction
Description:
Truly your questions are important to me. Alas, I am simply too distracted. 

These podlings--nasty little ones. I'm sure you've seen them. They're encroaching upon my nest and just a total nuisance. 

Bothering myself and my friends? The nerve! Here's my feather. Why don't you go change these nuisances into something less bothersome.
ObjectivesText: Weaken 8 podlings, then use Q'onzu's Faerie Feather to change them into Faerie Dragons.
